text: Joseph Campbell (March 26, 1904 â€“ October 30, 1987) was a writer known for his work on myth and religion. ==Quotes== "I think the person who takes a job in order to live- that is to say, for the money- has turned himself into a slave." ==Other websites== *Folkstory biography Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:1904 births Category:1987 deaths
